definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Meanwhile, just a quarter of auditors moving to in-house roles in the City are women.
sentences.chinese: 同时，伦敦城内四分之一改为坐班的审计师为女性。

sentences.english: In the meantime, we're serving ice cream sundaes instead.
sentences.chinese: 所以这段时间我们改为提供圣代冰淇淋。

sentences.english: Another office building was opened in 2001 as BOC Centre.
sentences.chinese: 另一新办公大楼奥海中心于2001年改为中银中心。

sentences.english: And rising bills are enough to make even the most bath-fond switch to showers.
sentences.chinese: 日益增加的水电费甚至足以令最爱缸浴的人改为淋浴。

sentences.english: We'll air conditioning unitcept change the terms of payment from L/C located at sight to D/P located at sight.
sentences.chinese: 我们答允将即期名誉证付款方式改为即期付款交单。

sentences.english: Changes the basic account the general account, might save transfers and takes present.
sentences.chinese: 将一般帐户改为基本帐户，可以存转并取现了。

sentences.english: I suggest changing this verse to "In dealing with employees, standards and directions must be clear."
sentences.chinese: 我提议把这句改为“待雇员，规令明”。

sentences.english: JDX Tea membership card has been changed to quality scores in exchange for Voucher to the program.
sentences.chinese: 九鼎香优质会员卡已更改为以分数换取礼券程式。

sentences.english: Wed like to change the unloading port from Tokyo to Osaka.
sentences.chinese: 我们愿意把卸货港由东京改为大阪。

sentences.english: They convert the study into a nursery when the baby is born.
sentences.chinese: 当婴儿出生的时候，他们将书房改为育婴室。

sentences.english: Range of kerf width and exposure may be changed for optimized performance.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的切缝宽度和曝光可能会改为优化的表现。

sentences.english: Capitalizes the first letter of words in the selection .
sentences.chinese: 将所选内容中文本单词的首字母改为大写。

sentences.english: If this option is specified, ownership is transferred to the new owner.
sentences.chinese: 如果指定这个选项，那么所有者就改为新的所有者。

sentences.english: We'll agree to alter the terms of payment from L/C at sight to D/P at sight.
sentences.chinese: 咱们同意将即期信用证付款办法改为即期付款交单。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Lama Temple main hall to the original green glazed tile yellow glazed tile.
sentences.chinese: 因此，雍和宫主要殿堂原绿色琉璃瓦改为黄色琉璃瓦。

sentences.english: It makes no difference to us to change the loading port from Shantou to Zhuhai.
sentences.chinese: 将装运港由汕头改为珠海对我们来说问题不大。

definition: to convert/to turn into (sth else)/to adapt (a story to another medium)
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
to add to existing facilities or services
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
